name: The King's Hand
description:
As the King's Hand, you're tasked with.. well, everything the King demands!

Complete the king's quests, for your Reputation is on the line!

Features

FORGE YOUR DICE - Customize your dice with new skills to change your fate!

ROLL YOUR DICE - Roll your forged dice and see what you can accomplish!

COMPLETE YOUR QUEST - Assign dice to quests to earn reputation and loot!

Windows executable can be reconfigured if you fancy that
